Beyond my classroom, I believe in the power of practical experience. I've delved into various coding projects, both solo and collaborative, to apply my knowledge in real-world scenarios. At last I would like to say that I am one of the most determined, hardworking and competitive person be in academics or be it extra-curricular activities. Thank You ðŸ’œ

projects.title: Blog Website
projects.description: My third-year project was the first React Web application I had the opportunity to work on. enables you to upload images and write your own blogs on any subject.

projects.title: Weather Detection
projects.description: Personal project for my own Experience. Takes in the name of any state or city of the world and tells its current weather using OpenWeather API.

projects.title: Tree-No Tree
projects.description: One of the first ever android apps I worked upon. I had to develop an android application that takes in a photo of any structure and detects whether that is a tree or not on the go. I've learned a lot!
